Package net.minestom.server.utils.clone

Class CloneUtils

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.utils.clone.CloneUtils
public final class CloneUtils extends Object
Convenient interface to deep-copy single object or collections.

Most of the methods require object to implement the PublicCloneable interface.
